caption.p: DDRP model predictions of voltinism (number of generations per year) in (A) Epiphyas postvittana (light brown apple moth) and (B) Neoleucinodes elegantalis (small tomato borer) in CONUS for 2018. Maps include estimates of climatic suitability, where long-term establishment is indicated by areas not under moderate (excl.-mod) or severe (excl.-sev) climate stress exclusion.
